sentences.en: Adult prevalence rates erratically, from a staggering 38.8 percent in Botswana to less than 1 percent in Senegal.
sentences.cn: 成年人的爱滋病盛行率因地而异, 从波札那的38.8%到塞内加尔的低于1%不等.

sentences.en: Adult prevalence rates swing erratically, from a staggering 38.8 percent in Botswana to less percent in Senegal.
sentences.cn: 成年人的爱滋病盛行率因地而异, 从波札那.8%到塞内加尔的低于1%不等.

sentences.en: As he became excited, his heart began to palpitate and more erratically.
sentences.cn: 由于他非常兴奋, 他心里开始扑腾越来越多的不稳定.

sentences.en: Does the volume of your logistics activity vary erratically?
sentences.cn: 您在物流方面的工作量是否存在不规律的变化?

sentences.en: If you change the surface of the baseball, it actually flies different, even erratically.
sentences.cn: 如果你改变棒球的表面, 球的飞行轨迹就会改变, 甚至会乱跑.

sentences.en: Magnetitite - bearing plugs are found erratically from the base of the Critical Zone.
sentences.cn: 含磁铁岩的岩栓不规则地分布于关键带的基底以上.

sentences.en: Mr. Lin was nearly out of his wits with anxiety . His heart thumped erratically.
sentences.cn: 林先生急得什么似的,心是卜卜地乱跳.

sentences.en: Pay close attention to anybody who is confused, abnormally clumsy, paddling off - course, or otherwise behaving erratically.
sentences.cn: 密切关注那些有糊涂 、 反常地笨拙 、 划空桨, 或者其它不正常的行为的人.

sentences.en: Police stopped him for driving erratically.
sentences.cn: 警察因其驾驶不循规则而把他拦下了。

sentences.en: Some family members might be behaving a bit erratically right now though.
sentences.cn: 你的一些家庭成员可能还是会表现得有些怪异.

sentences.en: The aircraft bumped along erratically without gathering anything like sufficient speed.
sentences.cn: 飞机忽上忽下，飞行很不平稳，根本未达到应有的速度。
